metadata.title: CVE-2022-29900 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mis-trained branch predictions for return instructions may allow arbitraryspeculative code execution under certain microarchitecture-dependentconditions.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
